data.title: Rashmi Ghosh - Senior Executive - Marketing Communications at Sudarshan Chemical Industries Ltd
data.meta_description: Rashmi Ghosh has a diverse work experience spanning various industries.
data.text:
Rashmi Ghosh has a diverse work experience spanning various industries. Rashmi started their career at Apollo Groups as a Customer Relationship Officer in 2003. Rashmi then worked at TejGyan Foundation as a Training Process Coordinator from 2006 to 2007. In 2007, they joined myJobsinPune.com as a Marketing Executive, where they stayed till 2009. From 2009 to 2010, Rashmi served as the Head of Marketing at Everywhere Medical Services Pvt. Ltd. Rashmi then moved to Kimberly-Clark as a Product Marketer from 2010 to 2011. Currently, they are working at Sudarshan Chemical Industries Ltd. as a Senior Executive in Marketing Communications, starting from April 2012.

Rashmi Ghosh completed their education with a Bachelor's degree in Arts and Humanities from Delhi University, which they obtained from 2000 to 2003. Afterwards, they pursued a degree in Apparel Merchandising at the Indian Institute of Fashion Technology from 2004 to 2005. Finally, they attended Symbiosis International University from 2005 to 2006, where they obtained a Postgraduate Diploma in Marketing.
